text: Actias callandra, the Andaman moon moth, is a moth in the family Saturniidae. It is found in India (the Andaman Islands). The larvae have been reared on Lannea coromandelica and possibly also feed on Rhizophora species.The Host Plant and Pre-imaginal Stages of Actias callandra (Saturniidae) from the Andaman Islands, India ==References== Callandra Category:Moths described in 1911 Category:Moths of India
title: Actias callandra
